description:
Give your brain a workout with 1001
Crystal Mazes Collection, the
deceptively simple jewel logic game!
It's easy to learn but hard to master.
Your task is to push the crystals
forward to their target destinations,
one at a time. Sounds simple, but be
careful! You can push your jewel into
an impossible locked position if you
don't plan ahead. As the mazes get
harder and the crystals pile up, you'll
need clever thinking to clear the
labyrinth. With over 1000 jewel-filled
puzzles, this fun collection will
challenge your mind and push your
brain skills to the limit.
name: 1001 Crystal Mazes Collection
